channel.title: How to register my own IP with my server?
channel.description:
Okay, so I downloaded PimpScape.
When you run it, and you log in, the IP is 0.0.0.0 and the port is 5555.
I then change the 0.0.0.0 to my own computers IP and try to log in, it says 'server must be down' etc..
How do I make it so it's my own IP address?
Please try and help me :)

item.title: How to register my own IP with my server?
item.dc:creator: @Steviie Steviie
item.description:
@Steviie wrote:

ok, sorry :o

so now, should i just go and register my IP from no-ip on moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/php?

sorry, i’m new to this

Read full topic
item.source: How to register my own IP with my server?

item.title: How to register my own IP with my server?
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

agg… just leave it -.- its suppose to be like that!! the way you log on is “localhost” dont edit tht thing on server… jsut leave it agg… and your peers log on with the ip on no-ip or hamachi!

Read full topic
item.source: How to register my own IP with my server?

item.title: How to register my own IP with my server?
item.dc:creator: @Steviie Steviie
item.description:
@Steviie wrote:

ok, well im confused i think.

so can you please explain a little more? sorry

do i log in with 0.0.0.0 when i run the server?

and do others log in with my IP?

p.s i don’t want a no-ip as i don’t know how to port forward

p.s i’m afraid i’ll mess up my internet if i portforward also i don’t know how to find my type of router (forget this)

Read full topic

btw the thing is suppose to be like that… i just realized. goto server.java and serach 5555… and its suppose to be like that. they will log on through no-ip dont worry. noting to be worried about!
